snippet.title: Bud Spencer & Terence Hill are back - Pre order now but Watch out.. THEY'RE MAD!
snippet.description:
They called him Trinity.. and Trinity is still his name! Our favorite duo returns for another round of fistfights with a brand new Spaghetti Western-style adventure - Slaps and Beans 2 is coming September 22!
Get ready for countless brawls and fun mini-games as you travel around the world in this new installment, true to the classic beat 'em up mechanics, but with an improved combat system that will ensure more than one rascal gets his proper beating 🥊 Hey, have you seen a guy in overalls with grease on his face? 

Pre order your own personal dose of slaps and beans from https://www.iningames.com/games/slaps-beans-2/
